title: U.S. intelligence agency selects vendors for space debris tracking project
summary: The Intelligence Advanced Research Projects Activity selected four vendors to develop technologies and new approaches for tracking small debris objects in space.

title: Voyager Space Partners With AirBus To Develop StarLab Commercial Space Stations
summary: Voyager Space and Airbus Defence and Space have announced a groundbreaking partnership for the joint development of the StarLab commercial space stations.

title: BREAKING! NSF NOIRLab Observatory Offline Following Cyber Attack
summary: The National Science Foundation's NOIRLab has announced that on August 1st it encountered an alarming cyber attack that targeted its computer systems.

title: Virgin Galactic Forecasts Low Revenue For Q3 and Q4
summary: Virgin Galactic has officially entered regular commercial operations but the company has advised that these flights will generate only modest revenues in the near future.

title: Final Antares flight successfully launches Space Station resupply mission
summary: Antares’ final mission was a 100 percent success as the rocket sent the Cygnus cargo spacecraft to the International Space Station. The...

title: iRocket To Develop & Test At Renowned US Air Force Base Facility
summary: The New York-based startup, founded in 2018, has recently entered into a groundbreaking agreement with the Air Force Research Laboratory (AFRL) to jointly develop and test rocket propulsion hardware.

title: Northrop Grumman Launches Final Russia-Ukrainian Build Antares Rocket
summary: On Tuesday evening at 8:31:14 PM EDT (00:31:14 UTC), Northrop Grumman ended an era of US space history with the final launch of the Antares 230+ launch vehicle carrying the Cygnus NG-19 spacecraft.

title: Startup iRocket signs agreement to develop and test hardware at U.S. Air Force facility
summary: Innovative Rocket Technologies, known as iRocket, has signed an agreement with the Air Force Research Laboratory to jointly develop and test rocket propulsion hardware.

title: Voyager Space and Airbus create commercial space station joint venture
summary: Voyager Space is joining forces with Airbus Defence and Space on a joint venture for the development of the Starlab commercial space station.

title: Virgin Galactic forecasts limited revenues from initial commercial flights
summary: Even as Virgin Galactic enters regular commercial operations of its suborbital spaceplane, it is advising that those flights will generate only modest revenues for the near future.
